message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to make a fair offer. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $1100000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I really like the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
